FuncDef: This command indicates whether or not the mac-move agent, when enabled usingconfig>service>vpls>mac-moveorconfig>service>epipe>mac-move, limits the MAC re-learn (move) rate on this SAP.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that the agent monitors the MAC re-learn rate on the SAP, and it blocks it when the re-learn rate is exceeded.
Specifies that this SAP is not blocked, and another blockable SAP is blocked instead.
